dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I am Umbrathor, the Shadowed Spectral Dragon. What trifles do you seek in this cursed realm?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am merely passing through, no intention to disturb your territory.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your feeble attempts at diplomacy are amusing. Why should I not crush you where you stand?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for any intrusion. I shall leave at once.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Intelligent choice. Begone, lest you wish to face my wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I do not fear your threats. Face me in battle if you dare.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravado in the face of annihilation? So be it, prepare to meet your end!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking knowledge and perhaps a chance for an alliance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is power, but alliances are fragile. What makes you think I would trust you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my loyalty and aid against the Shadow Legion. Together we can prevail.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An intriguing proposal, but your words alone are not enough to sway me. Prove your worth.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not grovel for trust. If you seek conflict, let it be settled now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pride cometh before the fall. Your defiance seals your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you, Umbrathor, to a test of strength and wit.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold and foolish, a rare combination. What stake do you offer for this challenge?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My victory shall grant you a boon of your choice.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A tempting offer, but victory is far from guaranteed. Let the challenge begin!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Should I lose, I will offer myself as your servant for a year and a day.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wager of servitude? Intriguing. Let fate decide our paths.
